item.text:
WHAT CONSTITUTES A “CELEBRATION”? Major international, national, milestone anniversaries or significant and unique achievements with positive customer or community impact CELEBRATION BRAND BY PASSION
  • Coca-Cola: Baseball, NASCAR
  • Coke Zero: College & Pro Football, College Basketball, College & Pro Hockey
  • Sprite: NBA Basketball
    •  CELEBRATION INCLUDES
  • Local teams winning a significant national achievement in a sporting event (i.e. winning the World Series)
  • Significant, unique achievements by individuals (Lance Armstrong winning a Tour de France)
  • BCS Champions
  • NASCAR Season Winner
  • Centennial Anniversary
    •  CELEBRATION DOES NOT INCLUDE
  • Opening of a new stadium
  • Commemorate a new athlete to a team
  • Individual NASCAR race winner
  • Annual festivals
  • Customer business milestones

DO'S
  • Leverage our Marketing Assets and their significant achievement to connect to our consumers through their passions
  • Leverage your local insights about the asset and the locale to maximize the brand connection with the asset
  • Consider ALL the ways to activate the celebration, like approved packaging elements, POS templates, print ads and/or approved licensed merchandise
  • Activate packaging and POS elements within 7 days of “celebratory” event for optimal results in the marketplace
  • Follow current packaging approval process
  • Review with your Region Asset Manager prior to customer sell-in
    •  DON’TS
  • Activate for annual, non-significant milestones, if unsure of what qualifies, please consult your Region Asset Manager for guidance
  • Just consider packaging as the only elements of activation
  • Create a composite logo (“lock-up”)
  • Make packaging available at Retail in anticipation of winning

<textHeader>WHAT IS IT?</textHeader> <textBody>Best in class activation of our assets with communication that enhances our trademark in order to maximize our investment and drive business results</textBody> <textHeader>OBJECTIVE</textHeader> <textBody>Create personal, meaningful connections between consumers and our brands through the celebration of their passions for our Marketing Assets in order to drive Sparkling Business</textBody>

WHAT IS IT? Trademark enhancement is best in class activation of our assets with sustaining communication that enhances our trademark in order to maximize our investment and drive business results / Marketing Asset Activation Guide / MAA Guiding Principles / MAA Implementation Tools / Customer Sales Aid OBJECTIVE Creative customized elements utilizing pre approved templates facilitate asset activation in-venue ACTIVATION CATEGORIES Packaging POS Advertising Merchandise Grass Roots & Social Media

OVERVIEW Packaging forms available for use:
  • 12oz Can Body
  • 16oz Can Body
  • 20oz Bottle Label
  • 8oz 6-Pack Carrier
  • Fridgepack Wrap
  • 24-Pack Wrap
  • 32oz Cup
    • NOTE: Any other package form not listed above should NOT be utilized 8oz Contour Bottle Guidelines:
  • As a key icon of brand Coca-Cola, the 8oz contour bottle should remain clear of properties, retailers or other event activation. The extremely limited label area should be dedicated to communicate Coca-Cola brand and the required legalese
  • Exceptions to this 8oz contour guideline may be granted if the package is to be used only for internal/constituent distribution (i.e. non-retail). Must utilize current 8oz bottle charter process to gain approval

Join Coca-Cola in congratulating {{[event title]}}. Nothing goes with celebrations better than an ice cold Coca-Cola. So, stop by your local {{[retailer]}}, grab some friends and make a toast to {{[event title]}}! You did it! Enjoy! Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

Coca-Cola celebrates {{[event title]}}. Wow! Victory sure tastes good. Just like the taste of an ice cold Coca-Cola. Ahhh! So, grab a coke at your local {{[retailer]}}, get together with friends and taste the moment. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

Join Coca-Cola in congratulating {{[event title]}}. Come together with friends and share some happiness as you celebrate this sensational triumph. Raise your glass and taste the moment. Congratulations {{[event title]}}! Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

All you fans! Here’s one more chance to celebrate your team, your champs! Coca-Cola invites you to taste the moment and congratulate {{[event title]}}! Grab an ice cold Coca-Cola, lift it high in the air and toast to {{[event title]}}. Ahhh. Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

Hey fans! Get excited, put your glasses together and join Coca-Cola in celebrating {{[event title]}}. Ahhh! There’s no better way to celebrate than with an ice cold Coke in your hand! Coca-Cola reminds us to stop and enjoy life’s simple pleasures – so, pick up some Coca-Cola at your local {{[retailer]}}, get together with friends and taste the moment as you celebrate the {{[event title]}}! Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

Hey fans! Get excited, put your glasses together and join Coca-Cola in celebrating {{[event title]}}. Ahhh! There’s no better way to celebrate than with an ice cold Coke in your hand! Coca-Cola reminds us to stop and enjoy life’s simple pleasures – so, grab some Coca-Cola, get together with friends and taste the moment as you celebrate the {{[event title]}}! Here, here! Coca-Cola. Open happiness.

<textHeader> TRAFFIC INSTRUCTIONS</textHeader> <textBody> Please use templates provided by The Coca-Cola Company. Any revisions made to the provided scripts, other than where indicated by [BRACKETS], must be submitted for approval. </textBody>

CONCEPT Secure lobby displays in large retail stores with Celebration elements to attract fans and drive impulse purchases at retail HOW IT WORKS
  • Order Celebration-themed POS and merchandise to create a Celebration zone within large-format retail stores (i.e. flag, banner, floor graphic, pole sign/stanchion, etc…)
  • Order Celebration-themed packaging
  • Work with key accounts/customer management to gain customer commitment/approval:
  • Promotional packaging authorization for in-store promotion
  • Display quantities/volume forecast (e.g., pallet display per store with the projected volume per store at 1-10 pallets)
    •  ACTIVATION THOUGHT STARTERS
  • Merchandise special Celebration-themed packaging with core ad packages to create a fan destination in-stores
  • Create a near-pack offer (i.e., get a free Celebration t-shirt when you buy (4)12-packs of Coca-Cola brands)
  • Floor-graphic placement in front of brand Coca-Cola in the beverage aisle
  • Create in-store excitement with signed elements and a register-to-win entry form tear pad and entry box (get coaches to sign the pole sign as a raffle prize)
  • Secure a radio remote from the retail store and brand the remote with Celebration banners and merchandise

OBJECTIVE Secure incremental inventory and sales in small stores with Celebration elements to attract fans and drive impulse purchases HOW IT WORKS
  • Order Celebration-themed POS and merchandise to create a Celebration area in-store (i.e., car magnet, balloons, banner, etc…)
  • Place Coca-Cola identified barrel coolers filled with commemorative IC product in small stores
    •  ACTIVATION THOUGHT STARTERS
  • Place an incremental barrel cooler with Celebration package product and promote multiple purchase with price offer (2 for $2.00 20oz., etc…)
  • Offer a Celebration themed merchandise “gift” with purchase
  • Put a Celebration frequency card program in place and offer Celebration-themed merchandise for 10 punches/visits

OBJECTIVE Secure incremental inventory and sales in small stores with Celebration elements to attract fans and drive impulse purchases HOW IT WORKS
  • Order Celebration-themed POS and merchandise to create a Celebration area in-store (i.e., car magnet, balloons, banner, etc…)
  • Place Coca-Cola identified barrel coolers filled with commemorative IC product in small stores
    •  ACTIVATION THOUGHT STARTERS
  • Place an incremental barrel cooler with Celebration package product and promote multiple purchase with price offer (2 for $2.00 20oz., etc…)
  • Offer a Celebration themed merchandise “gift” with purchase
  • Put a Celebration frequency card program in place and offer Celebration-themed merchandise for 10 punches/visits
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Design Machine (Approved Templates) / Website Kwikee (Extensive Customization) / Website

CONCEPT Coca-Cola helps celebrate the team victory immediately following the win at the venue HOW IT WORKS
  • Venue activation plan is developed
  • 12 cases of commemorative packaging are on-site at the venue in preparation for post-game celebration with the team
  • Divide the cases between locker room and media room
  • Ice down commemorative product in Coca-Cola ID barrels in advance to have waiting for the team
  • Put contingency plan in place to remove and destroy in-place product in case of loss, prior to the team entering the locker room

CONCEPT
  • Local bottler or campus ambassador “delivers” cold Coca-Cola to the outside, to local influencers such as:
  • Radio DJs
  • Campus Administration/Team Administration
  • City/State Officials and legislators
  • Coach/Team
  • Sorority/Fraternity
  • Band
  • Pep Rally Attendees
  • Key Retailers (HQ)
  • Lines for Events/Venues (e.g. Zoo, Aquarium, Concerts, etc…)
  • Parade route attendees/officials
    • SPECIAL DELIVERY “ADD-ON”:
  • Coca-Cola bottler uses a route/bulk delivery vehicle that has Celebration truck back graphics applied to the vehicle to “deliver” the team/coach/select players to the local influencers in the community
  • They exit the truck with ice cold Coca-Cola (Celebration packaging recommended) in hand and “deliver” cold Coca-Cola to the influencers

CONCEPT Create a special moment with Coca-Cola as a central part of a congratulatory toast as a part of the Celebration event. Create a memorable PR moment as the Coca-Cola bottler or representative officially “toasts” victory with the coach/official representative from the stage/podium at a local event by lifting a cold Coca-Cola in celebration of the team/event. HOW IT WORKS
  • Place commemorative cans or generic 8-oz glass bottles on the podium/stage to brand celebratory press conferences or events (i.e. parades, coach’s interviews, city celebration, etc…
  • Brand the stage/podium of the event with Celebration banner, Celebration commemorative can displays, and Celebration premiums
  • Fill a Coca-Cola ID cooler with cold Coca-Cola Celebration cans or 8-oz glass bottles
  • Distribute product to all officials on the stage or team to share in the toast
    •  SPECIAL DELIVERY “ADD-ON” Coca-Cola bottler uses a route/bulk delivery vehicle that has Celebration truck back graphics applied to the vehicle to “deliver” the team/coach/select players to the pep rally or celebration. The “delivered” guests will exit the truck and head to the event with an ice cold Coca-Cola (Celebration packaging recommended) in hand.

CONCEPT
  • Host a radio remote with a local station at the event
  • Supply prize giveaways to engage listeners and promote the celebration
  • Recommended radio prizes can include the following:
  • Celebration identified Coca-Cola product
  • Celebration T-shirts
  • Celebration site handouts (see list on Celebration merchandise)
  • Celebration coolers
  • Signed Celebration memorabilia, etc…
  • Brand the radio event with Celebration banners, Celebration balloons, barrel coolers, etc…
    •  SPECIAL DELIVERY “ADD-ON” Coca-Cola bottler uses a route/bulk delivery vehicle that has Celebration truck back graphics applied to the vehicle to “deliver” the team/coach/select players to the pep rally or celebration. The “delivered” guests will exit the truck and head to the event with an ice cold Coca-Cola (Celebration packaging recommended) in hand.

ORDERING To set up a Digital Photo Program order: Printroom Corporate Sales Team (888) 868-4157, extension 7000 / email CONCEPT Add value to local events with fun, celebration-themed digital photo program. Event fan photography branded with Coca-Cola “Celebrates” graphics is a great way for fans to keep the magic a live with a commemorative free photo offer. HOW IT WORKS
  • Event attendees/fans have their picture made and receive a download card from the photographer with a unique number and web address to a site where they can download their picture with a Celebration digital picture frame. After the event, fans go online and choose their photos from galleries posted on your website or upload their own digital images
  • Special Offer: Each fan will receive a FREE 8x10 downloadable picture in a Coca-Cola Celebration Themed frame. Fans will have a permanent reminder of the Coca-Cola Celebration event they attended
  • Plus, fans can create, order and purchase additional photos and specialty items such as mouse pads, calendars, framed prints and greeting cards to remember the special event hosted by Coca-Cola
  • See sample programs online
    •  HOW TO ORDER AND EXECUTE LOCALLY Contact: Printroom Corporate Sales Team (888) 868-4157, extension 7000 / email OR Hao Liu (Business Development Manager) (408) 642-0923 Allow 3 weeks prior notice. Provide Printroom with the following information:
    1. Date
    2. Time
    3. Location
    4. Attendance number of event
    5. On-site contact at the event
    6. Special instructions, if applicable (anything outside of normal set-up)

PRICING (based on event size)
  1. Less than 1,000 people / free image download = minimal charge of $1,000 and maximum charge of $2,000 (1 photographer recommended up to 8 hours)
  2. 1,000 – 2,000 people / free image download = minimal charge of $2,000 and maximum charge of $4,000 (2 photographers recommended up to 8 hours)
  3. 2,000 – 5,000 people / free image download = minimal charge of $3,000 and maximum charge of $5,000 (4 photographers recommended up to 8 hours)
  4. 5,000 – 10,000 people / free image download = minimal charge of $6,000 and maximum charge of $10,000 (6 photographers recommended up to hours)
NOTE: Region is responsible for photographer fees associated with this program.
<textHeader>WHAT IT IS</textHeader> <textBody>WebPage Banner Ad with Animation (Coca-Cola Fireworks) that can be uploaded to a host website for consumers/"fans" to view.</textBody>
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website
<textHeader>WHAT IT IS</textHeader> <textBody>Wallpaper/background for smartphones that can be downloaded from a host website to a fan phone.</textBody>
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website

WHAT IT IS
  • Embedded image of the Coca-Cola celebrates visual that
  • Can be downloaded from a host website to fan Facebook pages and shared within personal social networks
    •  HOW IT WORKS
  • Celebration icon file is shared with host web administrator to upload as a downloadable image from the host website
  • Fans visiting the host website can click on the icon and download the image to their facebook page to display as a profile picture or to share among personal networks
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website

OVERVIEW Congratulate the current season’s NFL, NCAA Basketball, NCAA Football and NHL champions
  • The Coke Zero target is an avid sports fan, and the celebration of the winning team in one Coke Zero’s partner leagues is an important aspect of the fan ritual
  • Coke Zero will join the fans in expressing support for the winning team by congratulating them via messaging on marketing materials
    • Provide local markets with tools to bring the celebratory message to life
  • The markets of the winning teams will leverage the assets and guidance outlined in this document to activate their local celebratory programming
    • Provide guidelines for the appropriate creation and use of the assets
  • To ensure consistency in the development and application of the toolkit, this VIS will outline how to communicate and how not to communicate the congratulatory message

NCAA BASKETBALL
  • Permitted to use the league name and championship name in designs (Final Four)
  • Permitted to use the name and logo of winning team if a Coca-Cola team
    • NCAA FOOTBALL
  • Permitted to use the league name but not permitted to use the championship name (BCS) so should use National Champions
  • Permitted to use the name and logo of winning team if a Coca-Cola team
    • NHL/NFL
  • Permitted to use the league name but not the championship name in designs (Stanley Cup, Superbowl) so need to use World Champions
  • Permitted to use the name and logo of winning team if a Coca-Cola team
ORDERING To get Approved Artwork: Finished Art / Website
